subject.normal: [Telepathy-commits] [telepathy-qt4/master] Add installable header for DBusProxy class, and add it to buildsystem.

headers.subject: [Telepathy-commits] [telepathy-qt4/master] Add installable header for DBusProxy class, and add it to buildsystem.

body.footer: --- TelepathyQt4/Client/DBusProxy | 6 ++++++ TelepathyQt4/Makefile.am | 1 + 2 files changed, 7 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-) create mode 100644 TelepathyQt4/Client/DBusProxy
body.para: diff --git a/TelepathyQt4/Client/DBusProxy b/TelepathyQt4/Client/DBusProxy new file mode 100644 index 0000000..d5b2c35 --- /dev/null +++ b/TelepathyQt4/Client/DBusProxy @@ -0,0 +1,6 @@ +#ifndef _TelepathyQt4_Client_DBus_Proxy_HEADER_GUARD_ +#define _TelepathyQt4_Client_DBus_Proxy_HEADER_GUARD_ + +#include <TelepathyQt4/cli-dbus-proxy.h> + +#endif diff --git a/TelepathyQt4/Makefile.am b/TelepathyQt4/Makefile.am index 9246f7e..9886ada 100644 --- a/TelepathyQt4/Makefile.am +++ b/TelepathyQt4/Makefile.am @@ -84,6 +84,7 @@ tpqt4clientinclude_HEADERS = \ Client/Connection \ Client/ConnectionManager \ Client/DBus \ + Client/DBusProxy \ Client/MediaSessionHandler \ Client/MediaStreamHandler \ Client/OptionalInterfaceFactory \
